channel.title: Comments on: Low-FODMAP Zucchini Olive Tapenade (AIP & Top 8 Free)

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/low-fodmap-zucchini-olive-tapenade-aip-top-8-free/#comment-462">Becky Leppard</a>.
Hi Becky, sorry I just saw your question! The large zucchini were roughly 6-8 inches long. I will measure the grated zucchini in cups next time I make the recipe to help clarify. Hope you give the recipe a try and let me know how it turns out!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Becky Leppard.

Hi Becky, sorry I just saw your question! The large zucchini were roughly 6-8 inches long. I will measure the grated zucchini in cups next time I make the recipe to help clarify. Hope you give the recipe a try and let me know how it turns out!

item.title: By: Becky Leppard
item.dc:creator: Becky Leppard
item.description: Thank you for this idea! I have so many food intolerances, but can have all the ingredients in this recipe! One question. About how many grated cups of zucchini is equal to he the two large zucchinis stated in the recipe. A large zucchinis can vary greatly in size. That you!
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for this idea! I have so many food intolerances, but can have all the ingredients in this recipe! One question. About how many grated cups of zucchini is equal to he the two large zucchinis stated in the recipe. A large zucchinis can vary greatly in size.
That you!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/low-fodmap-zucchini-olive-tapenade-aip-top-8-free/#comment-397">Yvonne Dakwar</a>.
The tapenade is served on sweet potato toast, one of my favorites. Just slice a sweet potato into 1/4"-1/2" strips and lightly coat with olive oil. Bake at 400°F for about 30-40 minutes.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yvonne Dakwar.

The tapenade is served on sweet potato toast, one of my favorites. Just slice a sweet potato into 1/4″-1/2″ strips and lightly coat with olive oil. Bake at 400°F for about 30-40 minutes.

item.title: By: Yvonne Dakwar
item.dc:creator: Yvonne Dakwar
item.description: What are you serving it on in the picture?
